cast.name: 里卡多·考特尼 Richard Courtney
库里·格拉汉姆 Currie Graham
D.哈尔兰·库特沙尔 D. Harlan Cutshall
伊妮德·雷伊·亚当斯 Enid-Raye Adams
娜塔莎·格雷格逊·瓦格纳 Natasha Gregson Wagner
布伦达·克里奇洛  Brenda Crichlow

director.name: 克里斯托弗·塔柏 Kristoffer Tabori

introduction: A highly ambitious second-rung corporate executive, Victor Sandeman (Currie Graham), is losing his life style as a result of poor investments. He sees a way out via a company merger, but the old man who runs the business opposes the deal. Victor decides to murder the old-timer so his weak-willed highly malleable grandson will be in charge. Thus the merger will be approved through Victor's manipulation of the heir. One problem, while carrying out his nefarious ploy with the old man's body still in the trunk, he rear ends a vehicle. The driver whose car is hit, Christine Sternwald (Natasha Gregson Wagner), remains adamant that all the information needed for insurance purposes be provided. This leaves Victor in a quandary. He makes up his mind to get rid of the accidental witness. This leads to several neat complications in the story involving mistaken identity, frustrating lures, and a police investigation into a homicide made to look like a heart attack leading to a car crash. Author: krorie from Van Buren, Arkansas维克托长期不满意自己的生活，因此想了一个恶毒的计划，杀害公司的老板，使其软弱的儿子继承后，他便可以控制一切，然而在运送老经理尸体时，却发生了车祸，尸体随时可能被发现……
